name: Tableau Odyssey
description:
Tableau I has been broken into pieces! Jump through different paintings to retrieve each piece of of the Tableau! Piece together your own weapon from different parts of the Tableau.

Controls:
WASD: Movement
Space: Jump
F: Interact with Canvas or Painting
Left Click: Fire Projectiles (if any).

Using the Canvas, you can make your own Weapons!

Click on building blocks and drag them into place
White Block: Normal Building Block,
Blue Block: Can Hit Enemies for Damage.
Yellow Block: Can Block Projectile Hits.
Red Block: Can Shoot Projectiles

Tools Used:
MSPaint, Paint.NET (only for transparency), my microphone, Unity.
